newsitem.title: INDIA: India Reliance up 5.0 pct before results.
newsitem.headline: India Reliance up 5.0 pct before results.

text.p: Shares of India's largest private firm Reliance Industries jumped 14.50 rupees, or five percent, to 294.50 at the Bombay bourse as speculators bought ahead of company results due on Tuesday, traders said.
The firm is expected to announce results for the financial year ended March 31, 1997 on Tuesday.
Reliance, which attracted higher annualised carry forward charges of about 8.80 rupees per share on Saturday entered a no-delivery period at the Bombay bourse, traders said.
A no-delivery period allows speculators to buy the stock without taking delivery for about a month.
